Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋のおかみさん
Entry.EnglishText: Inn Hostess

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダの女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Razildan Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカ港
Entry.EnglishText: Balka Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカ港
Entry.EnglishText: Balka Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: イゴルさんから、あんたたちが 世界のためにがんばってる事、 聞いたわ……
Entry.EnglishText: Igor told me what you've all been doing for the sake of our world...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私にできるのは、祈る事だけ…… あなたたち、そしてイゴルさん…… みんな元気で再会できますように……
Entry.EnglishText: The only thing I can do is pray... Please, let everyone stay safe... Please, allow us all to meet again...

Entry.JapaneseText: この前、お船の近くで 見たことのないお花を見つけたの。
Entry.EnglishText: The other day, I found a flower by the boats that I had never seen before.

Entry.JapaneseText: 図鑑にのってなかったら 大発見かも……
Entry.EnglishText: If it's not in any book, then it'd for sure be a great discovery...

Entry.JapaneseText: ねぇねぇ、図鑑貸して♪
Entry.EnglishText: Hey hey, can I borrow your reference book?♪

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『図鑑』を貸し出しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You lent the Reference Book.
Entry.Notes: I'm not sure that "lent away" sounds the best but it's a duplicate so I won't touch it

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう。 ちゃんと見るから、 チョット待っててね♪
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you. I need some time to look through it, so give me a moment!♪

Entry.JapaneseText: 図鑑があれば 調べられるんだけどなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: I wish I could look for it in a reference book...

Entry.JapaneseText: ねぇねぇ、聞いて聞いてっ！ 私が見つけたお花、 図鑑に載ってなかったの！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, listen! The flower I found wasn't in the book!

Entry.JapaneseText: これは大発見♪ どんな名前をつけようかなぁ。 ……あっ。コレ、ありがと。
Entry.EnglishText: This is a great Discovery!♪ I wonder what I should name it... Oh right, here you go. Thanks!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『図鑑』を回収しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You got back the Reference Book.

Entry.JapaneseText: どんな名前がいいかなぁー。
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what I should name it...

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん。これじゃない。 これも似てるけど違う……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... It's not this one... It kinda looks like this one, but this one also isn't my flower...

Entry.JapaneseText: あっ、ごめんね。 もうチョット貸しといて！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, sorry. I need some more time!

Entry.JapaneseText: お船の近くで見つけたから オフネノハナ……うーん。 もっとカワイイのが良いな……
Entry.EnglishText: Because I found it by the boats, I'll name it the Boat Flower... I'd prefer something cuter, though...

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダはあぶないからって、 宿屋のおかみさんと逃げて来たの。
Entry.EnglishText: We were told that it was dangerous in Razilda, so me and the innkeeper evacuated here.

Entry.JapaneseText: イゴルさんも一緒だったけど、 どっか行っちゃったの。 おかみさんは外にいるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Igor was with us, but he's gone off somewhere. The innkeeper lady is just outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: おかみさんといっしょに お祈りしてたの……
Entry.EnglishText: I was praying together with the innkeeper lady...

Entry.JapaneseText: イゴルさんが元気でいますように、 世界が平和になりますように、って。
Entry.EnglishText: We were praying that Igor stays in good health and that our world finds peace.

Entry.JapaneseText: イゴルさんが帰って来たら、 みんな一緒に仲良く暮らせたら いいんだけどなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope that when Igor returns, we can all live together in harmony...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『霧笛屋限定みやげのチラシ』（下段） 当宿限定「おひろめグミ」発売中！ お味は食べてビックリ、ヒミツです。 女王様のようにゴージャスで気品高い 逸品です。お早めにお買い求めください！
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Limited Souvenir Flyer - (bottom drawer) The Inauguration Gel is available for sale exclusively at our inn! The flavor is a secret, and you're in for a surprise when you taste it! It is a gel as gorgeous and elegant as our Queen. Be sure to purchase some soon!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『朝食メニュー』 ヘルシーな朝食を用意しました。 お好きなほうをお選びください。 Ａコース 「霧笛屋ニボシ定食」 Ｂコース 「霧笛屋わかめ定食」
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Breakfast Menu - We will prepare you a healthy breakfast. Please select the meal you want. Course A: Foghorn Inn Dried Sardine Meal Course B: Foghorn Inn Seaweed Meal

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『アロマランプと置物』（棚の上） サニイタウン製のアロマランプ。 ドリナの花のアロマオイルでリラックス。 隣にあるのは、パンチモンキーの置物。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Aroma Lamp and Decoration - (on shelf) An aroma lamp made in Sunnytown. The Drina flower oil is relaxing. Next to the lamp is a Punch Monkey figurine.
